content.rendered:
MAGICAL TOWNS

Mexico is folklore, traditions, culture, history, nature and cuisine.

All these attributes can be found in every corner of our country, but there are towns that concentrate this wealth in a cosmogony that makes them unique, and for this reason they have been called Magical Towns.

Currently, there are 177 destinations that meet the characteristics to have this designation, which in addition to their ‘magic’, have the necessary infrastructure to provide visitors with comfort and facilities during their stay.

TO LEARN MORE ABOUT OUR

CLICK HERE
